DATA SOURCES AND DOWNLOADS

Chicago Data Portal (https://data.cityofchicago.org/):
  • COVID-19 Cases, Tests, and Deaths by ZIP Code
    • download excel file: Chicago Data Portal- COVID-19 Cases, Tests, and Deaths by ZIP Code
  • COVID-19 Cases, Deaths, and Hospitalizations 
    • download excel file: Chicago Data Portal- COVID-19 Cases, Deaths, and Hospitalizations
  • Chicago Population Counts and Demographics:
    • download excel file: Chicago Data Porta- Chicago Population Counts
Chicago COVID-19 Community Health Equity Dashboard from DePaul University:
  • DePaul COVID-19 Community Health Equity Dashboard

Other data sources include World Health Organization COVID-19 global data and Johns Hopkins University time series data.
